headings.usage: Main headings, section titles, hero text

mono.usage: Code snippets, ID numbers, technical data

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + Tiny + Wide Spacing (tracking-[0.2em])
Line height: tight for headers, relaxed for body

primary.name: AMU Heritage Green
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key branding elements

colors.theme_strategy: Hybrid (Light Mode default for Dashboards, Dark/High-Contrast for Marketing)
colors.gradients: Avoid full-screen gradients. Use subtle noise textures or 'Tracing Beam' effects.

spacing_system.philosophy: Generous spacing (2-3x normal). Containers with borders MUST have internal padding (p-6/p-8).

student_dashboard.rules: Asymmetry, visual tension. Mix Hero (col-span-8), Square (col-span-4), Tall (row-span-2).

admin_dashboard.rules: Density, data correlation. Every pixel utilized. No jagged bottoms.

alignment.optical: Add extra padding to visually center text blocks next to round icons

components.marketing: Custom HTML + Tailwind (No Shadcn Cards). Use raw div/section for overlapping/asymmetry.
components.dashboard: Shadcn/UI (Heavily Customized). Remove 'Vercel-look'. Use 'Cardless' or 'Sharp Edge' styles.

interactive.buttons: Pill-shaped or Sharp. Hover: lift (-translate-y-1) + shadow-lg.
interactive.cards: Flat background, 1px subtle border, no shadow by default. Hover: shadow-md.

rules: Use specific transitions: 'transition: transform 0.2s ease, opacity 0.2s ease'

accessibility.contrast: APCA / WCAG AA (4.5:1 for normal text)
accessibility.interactive: Focus states must have higher contrast than default
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attribute

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' (generic centered layouts, uniform styling)
NEVER use AI assistant emojis (ðŸ¤–, ðŸ§ , etc.)
Main agent must use provided image URLs, NO placeholders
